scripts.clean-install: rimraf package-lock.json && rimraf node_modules && npm install
scripts.npmpack: npm run clean-install && npm pack && tar -xvf tagspaces-tagspaces-common-electron-2.1.20.tgz && npx shx cp -rL package/** ../../../tagspaces/node_modules/@tagspaces/tagspaces-common-electron && rimraf package
scripts.pkg-publish: npm run clean-install && npm publish --access public
